title: JSW MG Motor India looks to move away from internal combustion engine petrol, diesel vehicles
description: JSW MG Motor India, a joint venture between MG Motor and JSW Group, is shifting focus from traditional petrol and diesel vehicles to new energy vehicles. The company aims for nearly half of its sales to come from electric vehicles by the end of this year, starting with the launch of the Windsor EV.
